thread.title: Watch: Fly To The Sky’s Hwanhee Captures Gloomy Emotions In Solo Teaser Video
thread.title_full: Watch: Fly To The Sky’s Hwanhee Captures Gloomy Emotions In Solo Teaser Video

author: JiwonYu
title: Watch: Fly To The Sky’s Hwanhee Captures Gloomy Emotions In Solo Teaser Video
text:
Pin   
Fly to the Sky’s Hwanhee has released a teaser video of his new solo track ahead of his comeback ! 
On March 13, a teaser video of his new song “So It Is” was revealed through YouTube. 
The teaser is in black-and-white, and the imagery seems to be a metaphor for loneliness. 
The video ends with the release date “2017.03.17” written on the screen. 
Anticipation rises for the singer’s new album, since he has proven his amazing vocals through his “ King of Masked Singer ” appearance and because this is his solo comeback in five years and eight months. 
Watch Hwanhee’s teaser of “So It Is” below!
